title: A Roman Council Celebrated Under Stephen.
author: Appendix

paragraphs.text: A Roman Council Celebrated Under Stephen.

A Divine and sacred provincial synod, gathered together at Rome by Stephen, the blessed martyr and father[fn-105-P10562_3333453:1-nf] which excommunicated those who in an African synod had, without reason, conceded that they who came to the Catholic Church from any heresy should be re-baptized.[fn-105-P10563_3333673:2-nf]

references.text: as applied to all bishops. See p. 154, supra.
Reference is made to this council in Epistles of Cyprian, No. lxxiii., and at large in Epistles lxix. to lxxiv., pp. 375-396, supra.
